alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington; Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 11 at 2:56PM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches possible. * WHERE...In Oregon, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon and Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon. In Washington, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington. * WHEN...From late Friday night through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington; Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest
